features.title: Easy Appointment Scheduling
features.description: Schedule appointments with other users easily with just a few clicks.

features.title: Manage Your Schedule
features.description: View, accept, or decline appointments and manage your schedule efficiently.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Use the application on any device with a fully responsive and user-friendly design.

features.title: Secure Payments
features.description: Make secure and hassle-free payments for all transactions in the platform.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Access our dedicated customer support team anytime for any assistance.

features.title: Real-time Notifications
features.description: Get instant notifications for any important activity or messages.
